Articles.Content:
Hiya - pvtnum11 here, been playing the game August of last year after futzing around with the 0.13 demo. Haven't done too much of anything particularly AWESOME or anything, although I have tossed up a few youtube vids (of dubious quality) up, but a Scott Manley I am not.

Currently playing stock, although I might grab Kerbal Engineer and Telemachus again, since they were both useful and fun.

Managed some modular assemble-in-orbit ships, one of which was stable enough for a Duna trip. Making another one with more delta-v capacity, might do Jool with it.
